title: (x) Game Boy logo - (similar to) Gill Sans {Mark S}
content:
Does anybody recognize this type face?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [gameboy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081004234826/http:/typophile.com/files/gameboy.jpg) | 17.38 KB |

 [‹ (x) Wander and the Colossus - ITC Esprit {Edward (self)}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081004234826/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16462 "Go to previous forum topic") [schwinn logo font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081004234826/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16453 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Edward Hyde

comments.content: It appears to be based on [Gill Sans Bold Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081004234826/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.52.0.6&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=GAMEBOY&sampleSize=48), but a bit bolder and more condensed. Probably custom.
That seems to be close enough. Thanks.
